SummaryEnglish: Takagi loves to tease, and her victim is none other than her next-seat classmate, Nishikata. She knows too well of Nishikata that it's almost impossible to get back at her. But this won't dispirit a determined Nishikata who is always looking for a chance to give Takagi a taste of her own medicine.

1.SummaryEnglish: Middle schooler Nishikata is often teased by Takagi, the girl who sits next to him in class. One day, he decides to try teasing her back.

2.SummaryEnglish: Nishikata notices that Takagi isn’t riding her bike to school. When he asks her why, she jokingly tells him she wants to walk while holding his hand.

3.SummaryEnglish: While Takagi and Nishikata work in the school library during the lunch break, Takagi suddenly makes a comment that takes Nishikata by surprise.

4.SummaryEnglish: Hoping to end the year with a victory, Nishikata challenges Takagi to a game, but she sets an unusual rule: whoever makes the other person happy wins.

5.SummaryEnglish: On Valentine’s Day, Nishikata resolves to keep his cool around Takagi and not let her tease him but secretly hopes she will give him some chocolate.

6.SummaryEnglish: When Nishikata hears from Nakai that Takagi is moving away, it begins to weigh on his mind. Later that day, Takagi tells him the news directly.

7.SummaryEnglish: On Takagi’s last day at school, a melancholic Nishikata struggles to process his feelings about her leaving. Mr. Tanabe gives him some encouragement.

8.SummaryEnglish: On the first morning of the new academic year, Nishikata gets an unexpected phone call from Takagi. Later, he encounters a surprise at school.
